com.amazonaws.services.polly.model

Class SynthesisTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.services.polly.model.SynthesisTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SynthesisTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    SynthesisTask object that provides information about a speech synthesis task.

    See Also:

      • getLexiconNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLexiconNames()

        List of one or more pronunciation lexicon names you want the service to apply during synthesis. Lexicons are applied only if the language of the lexicon is the same as the language of the voice.

        Returns:

        List of one or more pronunciation lexicon names you want the service to apply during synthesis. Lexicons are applied only if the language of the lexicon is the same as the language of the voice.

      • getOutputFormat

        public java.lang.String getOutputFormat()

        The format in which the returned output will be encoded. For audio stream, this will be mp3, ogg_vorbis, or pcm. For speech marks, this will be json.

        Constraints:
        Allowed Values: json, mp3, ogg_vorbis, pcm

        Returns:

        The format in which the returned output will be encoded. For audio stream, this will be mp3, ogg_vorbis, or pcm. For speech marks, this will be json.

        See Also:
        OutputFormat

      • getSampleRate

        public java.lang.String getSampleRate()

        The audio frequency specified in Hz.

        The valid values for mp3 and ogg_vorbis are "8000", "16000", and "22050". The default value is "22050".

        Valid values for pcm are "8000" and "16000" The default value is "16000".

        Returns:

        The audio frequency specified in Hz.

        The valid values for mp3 and ogg_vorbis are "8000", "16000", and "22050". The default value is "22050".

        Valid values for pcm are "8000" and "16000" The default value is "16000".

      • setSampleRate

        public void setSampleRate(java.lang.String sampleRate)

        The audio frequency specified in Hz.

        The valid values for mp3 and ogg_vorbis are "8000", "16000", and "22050". The default value is "22050".

        Valid values for pcm are "8000" and "16000" The default value is "16000".

        Parameters:
        sampleRate -

        The audio frequency specified in Hz.

        The valid values for mp3 and ogg_vorbis are "8000", "16000", and "22050". The default value is "22050".

        Valid values for pcm are "8000" and "16000" The default value is "16000".

      • getLanguageCode

        public java.lang.String getLanguageCode()

        Optional language code for a synthesis task. This is only necessary if using a bilingual voice, such as Aditi, which can be used for either Indian English (en-IN) or Hindi (hi-IN).

        If a bilingual voice is used and no language code is specified, Amazon Polly will use the default language of the bilingual voice. The default language for any voice is the one returned by the DescribeVoices operation for the LanguageCode parameter. For example, if no language code is specified, Aditi will use Indian English rather than Hindi.

        Constraints:
        Allowed Values: cmn-CN, cy-GB, da-DK, de-DE, en-AU, en-GB, en-GB-WLS, en-IN, en-US, es-ES, es-MX, es-US, fr-CA, fr-FR, is-IS, it-IT, ja-JP, hi-IN, ko-KR, nb-NO, nl-NL, pl-PL, pt-BR, pt-PT, ro-RO, ru-RU, sv-SE, tr-TR

        Returns:

        Optional language code for a synthesis task. This is only necessary if using a bilingual voice, such as Aditi, which can be used for either Indian English (en-IN) or Hindi (hi-IN).

        If a bilingual voice is used and no language code is specified, Amazon Polly will use the default language of the bilingual voice. The default language for any voice is the one returned by the DescribeVoices operation for the LanguageCode parameter. For example, if no language code is specified, Aditi will use Indian English rather than Hindi.

        See Also:
        LanguageCode
